data.meta_site_name: Springfield Memorial Gardens, Funeral Home & Cremation Center
data.text:
Born in Cambridge, OH on February 13, 1926 Departed on October 4, 2008 and resided in Franklin, TN

Robert Lee Alexander born February 13, 1926 in Cambridge, Ohio. Died October 4, 2008 at Williamson County Medical Center, Franklin, TN. Son of the late Michael and Freda Alexander.

Preceded in death by son "Bobby" Alexander, brothers Ed, Alex George and sister Marie.

He is survived by his wife Judy. Daughters Kimberly Alexander, Cynthia Michael Gillooly, Karen Mark Foertmeyer, Lisa Robert Strait and Kelly Mike Smith. Grandchildren: Dominic, Elliot and Max Gillooly, Eric, Matthew, Andrew and Daniel Foertmeyer, Branden and Tierany Smith, Ian, Alexandra and Sarah Richeson. Great Grandchildren: Emily Gillooly and Noah Foertmeyer.

WWII Navy Veteran. Served in the South Pacific as a Bosen Mate on an LCI. Also served during the Korean conflict.

Worked in family shoe store in Cambridge, Ohio until joining IDS in 1963. Was Divisional Sales Manager for IDS/American Express in Mansfield, Dayton and Columbus, Ohio and Nashville, TN until 1985. Joined Raymond James Financial Services in 1985 until he retired in 2003.

Longtime member of Hillwood Country Club. Member of Church of the Resurrection.

Pallbearers Ralph Colaberdino, Bill Derryberry, Pat Foster, Bill Hodde, Robert Selph and John Sontag.

In lieu of flowers, donations may be made in memory of Bob to Church of the Resurrection, 1216 Sneed Rd., Franklin, TN 37067.

Visitation will be held Friday, October 10 from 4-7 p.m. at Harpeth Hills Memory Gardens, 9090 Hwy. 100, Nashville, TN 37221. Funeral services to be held Saturday, Oct. 11, 10:00 a.m. at Church of the Resurrection, 1216 Sneed Rd., Franklin, TN 37067. Interment will follow at Harpeth Hills Memory Gardens.
